question.title: Will a member of the Trump family be the Republican nominee for the US Presidency in 2024?
question.body:
Resolves **Yes** if one of these individuals is the Republican nominee for the US Presidency in 2024:

 - Donald Trump
 - Donald Trump Jr.
 - Eric Trump
 - Ivanka Trump
 - Tiffany Trump
 - Melania Trump
 - Barron Trump

metadata.source_question: Will a member of the Trump family be the Republican nominee for the US Presidency in 2024?

question.title: Will a member of Donald Trump's family secure the Republican nomination for the 2024 US Presidential election?
question.body:
This will resolve to **Yes** if any of the following individuals becomes the Republican nominee for the US Presidential race in 2024:

 - Donald Trump
 - Donald Trump Jr.
 - Eric Trump
 - Ivanka Trump
 - Tiffany Trump
 - Melania Trump
 - Barron Trump

question.title: Will Donald Trump be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Donald Trump is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question may consider new candidates added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

metadata.source_question: Will Donald Trump be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?

question.title: Will Donald Trump secure the Republican nomination for the 2024 Presidential Election in the United States?
question.body:
This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Donald Trump is chosen by the Republican National Convention to be the nominee for the 2024 Presidential Election in the United States. Any other candidate will result in a **No**. The question remains open to considering new candidates who may emerge in the future.

For the purpose of this question, the focus is not on who is the Republican nominee on the day of the 2024 US election; it solely depends on who is selected by the delegates at the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will Tucker Carlson be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Tucker Carlson is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidate being selected will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently listed; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

metadata.source_question: Will Tucker Carlson be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?

question.title: Will Tucker Carlson secure the Republican nomination for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This inquiry will be answered with a **Yes** if Tucker Carlson is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If any other candidate is chosen, the answer will be **No**. This question is open to candidates beyond those currently known; additional options might be considered later.

For this inquiry, the focus is not on who holds the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is exclusively about who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).
